1.content:
You were very excited. Your sister invited you to go on Spring Break with her because your parents needed to go on a business trip and why would you say no to Spring Break at a sunny beach? You just finished packing your clothes into a green suitcase and are waiting at the airport.

"So Jacob, are you excited?" Sarah asks.

"Yeah, this is gonna be fun" you say.

"You know that my friends are already there, and please don't hit on them like you always do."

"I won't I promise, they know I always joke around"

"Yeah, but the girls that don't know you won't"

"Fine, I promise" you say as you hear the announcer call your plane number and you get on with your sister.

The plane ride was okay, nothing special. You get off the plane and gather your green suitcase and get in a taxi to your hotel. When you get there you start to unpack, when you notice something wrong. Instead of your jeans, bathing suit and boxer shorts, the suitcase was filled with skirts, bikinis, panties and other feminine clothing.

"Hey Sarah, something's wrong!"

"What is it Jacob?"

"My stuff is gone" a lump appears in your throat, and you feel sick.

"Looks like the airline mixed up your luggage, I'll call and report it" she says and walks out to report it.

You sit down and try to figure out what's going to happen if you don't have clothes.

Your sister walks back in and says, "Listen Jacob, the airline says they will wait for another report about wrong luggage, but for now you are stuck with these clothes. I think that you should try them on, to see if they fit, since you'll need to wear something in case the ones you're wearing get too dirty"

"Yeah, I guess you're right"

"Okay, so just try on the casual stuff. Oh and you'll have to wear the panties because boxers don't fit right in women's clothes"

"OK, so just leave so I can change and I'll call you back in when I have something on"

What to try on first?

Once you had pulled your panties back up, Sarah gave you a quick hug. "You need to relax and just be yourself or this won't be much of a vacation for you."

With that said, you and Sarah washed up and she walked you back into the party where Erin offered you your drink. Blushing from both nerves and embarrassment, you took the drink and allowed Erin to walk you to the couch in the next room of the apartment suite.
143321211111.title: A slap to snap you out of it.

choices: You just had a bad panic attack.
1433212111111.content:
"Sorry about earlier." Blushing, Erin said. "When I saw you smile, I just assumed it was the green light to go a little further."

Knowing from experience, you replied, "All boys think that." You then blushed and added, "Try not to be like the other boys, I do kind of like you."

Of course, you meant that in a brotherly way but after saying it you wished you had phrased it differently. Erin blushed deeply and replied, "I kind of like you too."

The rest of the party went smoothly, though awkwardly and eventually, it was time for you and your friends to return to your suite for the night. "We all had a great time." Bemused, Sarah said. "I think Erin and Jessica had the most fun though."

Both you and Erin blushed slightly to the chuckles it brought. Once you were back in your room, Sarah came to you concerned. "Let's have a look at your bleeding issue." Serious, she said. "Then we are going to have a talk about your little freak out."

"I didn't do anything wrong, sis.." Softly, you protested.

"I didn't say you did anything wrong." Calmly, Sarah countered. "But still, this is not like you, I'm worried."

"Maybe we should have just bought some clothes at the store." Wincing, you said.

"Maybe." Wincing, Sarah agreed. "However, too many people have seen you as Jessica so we have to ride it out now or risk looking weird or worse."

Sarah then escorted you into the bathroom and had you pull down your panties. To her deeper concern, you were still bleeding and she could detect a familiar scent that caused her to nearly freak out herself. "How could he be having a period?" Worried, she thought. "It doesn't make any sense unless..." She moaned then muttered, "Mother..."

"What?" Worried, you asked.

Sarah winced. "Remember when mom said she was tempted to use that new, experimental drug on you to carry you the rest of the way into womanhood?"

You turned pale. "She didn't..."

Sarah slowly nodded to your further horror. "We're going to have to get you to the hospital to confirm it but i fear you are having your first period... as a real woman."

This became too much for you and you fainted. Later, at the hospital, Sarah explained the situation to the doctors and they ran a number of tests on you. Your friends waited anxiously as Sarah was approached by the doctor.
1433212111111.title: You and Erin talk.

14332121111113.content:
"I fear the experimental drug you described has been introduced into your brother, or rather, sister's system." Calmly, the doctor explained. "She is experiencing her first menstrual cycle and the rest of the physical changes will occur at an accelerated rate within the next day or two so those prosthetic breasts will have to go once she feels the pressure of her real bust blossoming."

Sarah winced, her fears confirmed and thanked the doctor before taking you back to the hotel suite. "I should have known from the beginning." Ruefully, she said.

"What do you mean?" Confused, you asked. "There was no way you could have known mom slipped that drug to me."

"It's was a bit all too convenient that the girls clothing in the mixed up luggage fit you perfectly once the prosthetic breasts were put in." Firmly, Sarah said. "I'm guessing you getting those clothes was no accident."

You gulped at that. "Why would mom do that to me?" Worried, you demanded.

"I don't know, bro, err, sis." Wincing, Sarah said. "All we can do is try to enjoy the rest of our vacation, helping you be the best teenage girl you can be." She giggled at that. "We'll make a real woman out of you."

"Why are you saying that with such a creepy grin?" Unnerved, you asked.

Upon reaching the hotel suite, Sarah...
14332121111113.title: You are becoming a woman.

143321211111131.content:
Sarah called everyone into the living room of the apartment suite and told them what the doctor had found and her suspicions regarding the mixed up luggage. The girls' reactions varied. Allie raised a hand to her mouth in shock as Zoe sighed, shaking her head. The others seemed sad by the news and looked to you with a sense of sympathy.

"No wonder you were feeling so weird at the party." Wincing, Kylie said. "The first one is always the roughest and you were originally a guy."

"There is nothing we can do about what your mother did while on vacation." Serious, Natalie said. "From what you told us, the effects are irreversible so we need to get Jessica ready for an entirely new reality."

You gulped at that. "What did you have in mind?" nervous, you asked.

Zoe gave a rueful smile. "Well, first, you need to be given The Talk." Calmly, she said. "Next, we need to give you a shot of feminine confidence."

"I don't like where this is going." Nervous, you said.

Sarah giggled. "It's not as bad as you think." Smiling, she said. "We'll start with..."
143321211111131.title: A new reality.
